help.whyContent: Index Cards are an effective way to learn and review knowledge. The cards allow you to easily learn the flags of the world.

howContent.cardClick: Click on a card to turn it over and see the answer.
howContent.goNext: Click on the 'X' if you don't know the card. Click on the 'checkmark' if you know the card.
howContent.cardMove: Correct cards will be moved to the next deck and wrong cards to the previous deck.
howContent.reset: You can click on 'Reset' at any time to reset all data.

resetConfirm: Do you really want to reset all data? This action cannot be undone.
